name: Name
aboutUsDescription: Read more about us, our vision, mission, and the story behind Alo Doktor.
aboutConnectHealthcare: We help connect healthcare for everyone
aboutPlatformDescription: Alo Doktor is a digital healthcare platform connecting individuals, doctors, and clinics in one seamless experience. We simplify appointment booking, consultation management, and clinic operations for everyone.
aboutVitalLook: Take a vital look at our application working
aboutTermsDescription: By accessing and using the Alo Doktor platform, you agree to be bound by our terms of service. Our team is dedicated to providing the best possible support and technology for our users.
bookOnlineConsultationsDesc: Easily book and manage online consultations with healthcare professionals from anywhere.
weSetTheBarDesc: We use the latest technology and best practices to ensure the highest standards in digital healthcare.
seamlessExperienceDesc: Enjoy a seamless, secure, and user-friendly experience for all your healthcare needs.
jobsDescription: Join the Alo Doktor team and help shape the future of digital healthcare.
noVacantPosition: At the moment we don't have a vacant position. Please come back later.
monitorImpactRealTime: Monitor your impact in real time
stayOrganized: Stay organized and never miss a visit
backedByPortokalle: Backed by the Alo Doktor team
usePortokalleDigital: Use Alo Doktor as your digital practice
startConsultingSimpleSteps: Start consulting in a few simple steps
joinPortokalleSeamless: Join Alo Doktor and unlock a seamless experience: manage your profile, receive appointments, consult with patients, get paid instantly, and access dedicated support—all in one place.
allHealthRecordsSecure: All your health records in one secure place
readyToTakeControl: Ready to take control of your health?
joinPortokalleToday: Join Alo Doktor today and connect with top doctors from the comfort of your home.
failedToFetchDoctors: Failed to fetch doctors. Please try again.
contactUsDescription: We're here to help! Reach out to our team for support, partnership, or any questions about Alo Doktor.
getInTouchWithTeam: Get in touch with our team
getInTouchDescription: Whether you have a question about features, pricing, need a demo, or anything else, our team is ready to answer all your questions.
fastResponseDescription: Our team is dedicated to responding to your inquiries as quickly as possible.
multiChannelDescription: Contact us via email, phone, or our online form—whatever works best for you.
securePrivateDescription: Your messages and data are handled with the utmost security and privacy.
profileIncompleteWarning: Your profile is incomplete. Please complete your profile
notesPlaceholder: Please describe your symptoms or reason for the appointment...
telemedicineDescription: Access healthcare professionals anytime, anywhere. Join us today and experience the future of medicine.
joinAsPatientOrDoctor: Join as a patient or doctor.
heroDescription: Connect with licensed doctors from the comfort of your home. Schedule consultations, receive prescriptions, and access medical care—anytime, anywhere.
yourHealthAnywhereSubtitle: Connect with certified healthcare professionals from the comfort of your home. Experience seamless and secure virtual consultations tailored to your needs.
virtualConsultationsDesc: Speak with doctors and specialists via secure video calls, anytime, anywhere.
secureAndPrivateDesc: Your health data is encrypted and protected, ensuring complete confidentiality.
comprehensiveCareDesc: From prescriptions to follow-ups, manage your health effortlessly.
joinThousandsPatients: Join thousands of satisfied patients who trust our platform for their healthcare needs. Experience the future of medicine today.
whyChooseTelemedicineDesc: Save time, reduce stress, and access quality healthcare without leaving your home. Our platform is designed to make healthcare accessible, affordable, and efficient.
getInTouchSubtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you shortly.
errorOccurred: An error occurred. Please try again.
runClinicOnline: Run your clinic online and manage all patients in one place
accessHealthcareProfessionals: Access to a network of healthcare professionals
analyticsReporting: Analytics and reporting for clinic performance
joinPortokalleManageClinic: Join Alo Doktor and manage your clinic, patients, and payments online with ease.
usePortokalleAsOnlineClinic: Use Alo Doktor as your online clinic: list your doctors, manage appointments and consultations, track performance, and collect payments—all in one modern, secure platform.
privacyPolicySubtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how Alo Doktor protects your data and respects your rights.
privacyPolicyIntro: Alo Doktor is committed to protecting your privacy and handling your data in accordance with the highest standards of data protection and security.
whatDataWeCollectText: We only collect the minimum information necessary to provide our services. This includes your email address and a password (which is securely encrypted and never visible to us). We do not store any medical records or personal health data.
howYourDataIsStoredText: All data is stored in a secure, encrypted environment using industry-standard security practices. We take all reasonable steps to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or loss.
yourRightsText: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time. For any privacy-related requests, please contact us at
dataProtectionStandardsText: Alo Doktor complies with all applicable data protection laws and regulations. We do not sell or share your data with third parties. Your privacy and security are our top priorities.
securityText: We use advanced security measures to safeguard your data. While no system is completely immune to risks, we are dedicated to keeping your information as safe as possible.
policyUpdatesText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any significant changes will be posted on this page.
redirectToLoginShortly: You will be redirected to the login page shortly.
adminNotificationsPlaceholder: Admin notifications will appear here. We can reuse the existing notifications component or tailor an admin-specific feed.
